post.body: haha, I had a delicious bento to munch on for lunch, so I skipped the @orlandoichiban meetup. Maybe next time. :)
Is that a Storm Riders anime? Sweet! I'm looking forward to Storm Riders 2 later this year. http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1186371/
definitely use that a lot. Worth adding an entry to your .bash_profile for it so it's the default: alias grep='grep -E --color'
Fusebox, ColdBox, CF on Wheels, Model-Glue and Mach-II are the big ones. FB is the hugest, but CFWheels is RoR for CF. CB is nice
Nice how Software Engineer and Programmer are on the top 20 jobs out there. SE is high for hours/wk, not surprised http://tinyurl.com/6tvjm5
No new Mac Mini. :(
uh oh, 4chan took over macrumorslive.com
Looks like whatever bug I have has moved from the "always freezing" state to "can't stop sweating".
I never think being sick is that bad until I catch something. At least a marathon session of The Wire has kept me feeling good. S2 finale!
Nooooo, just finished season 1 of The Wire and realized I don't have season 2.
Anyone ever mess around with the Netflix prize competition? Looks like a fun problem to mess around with. http://www.netflixprize.com/
Magic Wok on Conroy and Turkey Lake is now my favorite Chinese food restaurant in Orlando. Delicious fresh made noodles and pork buns!
It's amazes me how there is a complete lack of a global movie database with a decent API. (the text files IMDB provides don't count)
Just FYI, roth IRA max contribution is 5k for 08&09 and you have until you file tax returns to make '08 contributions. '09 might be raised.
I think the worst part about @izeainc is unfortunate beer bottle to beer bottle opener ratio.
There's a ton of people on the streets of downtown Orlando for the parade!
After a few days working on a layout I tried it in IE7 and for the first time ever didn't cry. Was only a clear:both; in footer away in IE!
Let the Right One In is definitely worth watching if you get a chance. One of, if not the best vampire movie I've ever seen.
At a 50th anniversary party with @trickster_brat and fam. http://twitpic.com/x5so
Relaxing on our porch while Lily and Loverboy play (our dog and cat). http://twitpic.com/sxb0
